summary: Completed comprehensive testing of InsectControl Tupy management system. Backend JWT authentication and all APIs working perfectly (21/21 tests passed). Frontend login works but has critical authentication state persistence issues when navigating to protected routes.

integration_issues.issue: Users get redirected to login page when navigating directly to /clientes, /servicos, /agenda routes
integration_issues.impact: Prevents users from accessing main application features after login

integration_issues.issue: Authentication state not properly maintained during route changes despite token being in localStorage
integration_issues.impact: Breaks user experience and prevents normal app usage

passed_tests: Login page UI and form functionality
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix JWT authentication state persistence issue in frontend. Users cannot navigate to protected routes (/clientes, /servicos, /agenda) after login - they get redirected back to login page. This must be resolved before implementing Firebase Google login migration. Issue is in AuthContext or Protected component route handling.
